subject: Events GET - Need Complete Parameter List

questions.q1: What ALL query parameters does Express /api/events support?

questions.q4: Any special handling for certain event types?

message.count_diff: Express returns 384, AF returns 396. Likely the recurring event logic differs slightly. Can you share the exact Express query?
